flawed_nl_solution:
Three fewer trumpets than Miles has fingers is 10-3=<<10-3=7>>7 trumpets.
Two more guitars than he has hands is 2+2=<<2+2=3>>3 guitars.
Two more trombones than he has heads is 2+1=<<2+1=3>>3 trombones.
And one fewer French horn than he has guitars is 3-1=<<3-1=2>>2 French horns.
Altogether, Miles owns 7+3+3+2=<<7+3+3+2=15>>15 musical instruments.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 3. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
